{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.02276v1", "title": "Distortion from spheres into Euclidean space", "summary": "Any function from a round $n$-dimensional sphere of radius $r$ into
$n$-dimensional Euclidean space must distort the metric additively by at least
